scripts.package-mac: electron-packager . KrossyKey --overwrite --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --icon=assets/icon/icon_mac.icns --prune=true --out=release-builds && hdiutil create -volname KrossyKey -srcfolder release-builds/KrossyKey-darwin-x64/ -ov -format UDZO release-builds/KrossyKey-darwin-x64.dmg
scripts.package-win32: electron-packager . KrossyKey --overwrite --asar=true --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=assets/icon/icon_windows.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName=CE --version-string.FileDescription=CE --version-string.ProductName="Cross Platform Keychain" && zip -r -X KrossyKey-win32-ia32.zip release-builds/KrossyKey-win32-ia32/ && mv KrossyKey-win32-ia32.zip release-builds/
scripts.package-win64: electron-packager . KrossyKey --overwrite --asar=true --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --icon=assets/icon/icon_windows.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName=CE --version-string.FileDescription=CE --version-string.ProductName="Cross Platform Keychain" &&  zip -r -X KrossyKey-win32-x64.zip release-builds/KrossyKey-win32-x64/ && mv KrossyKey-win32-x64.zip release-builds/
